# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

1. EmbOff received written request from Javier Salinas R., technical manager SIDERSA, to help find three American experts, one each for following fields: (1) Iron-steel metallurgy, (2) Open cut mining on Mutun hematite deposit, and (3) Evaluator of iron-steel metallurgical project with experience in marketing iron-steel products. Contracts to start November, 1974, scheduled for three months but could be extended to five months. No salaries or fees mentioned. USDOC action request: Advertise SIDERSA's request in Commerce Today and in any other appropriate manner.

2. Replies by interested experts should be addressed to Ing. Javier Salinas R., Gerente Tecnico, Empresa Siderurgica Boliviana S.A., Avenida 16 de Julio 1769, La Paz, Bolivia: Telegraph address-SIDERSA, Casilla 7082, La Paz, Bolivia.
